sense.def:
Kadar nekaj traja
for a short time
, ne traja dolgo časa.

seg.quote: He uttered a short cry of surprise.

sense.def:
Govori, pisma ali knjige, ki so
short
, nimajo veliko besed ali strani.

Kdor je
short
, ni tako visok kot večina ljudi.

Predmet, ki je
short
, od enega konca do drugega ne meri veliko.

Kdor je
short with someone
, z nekom govori nepotrpežljivo in jezno.

To have a short temper
pomeni hitro se razjeziti.

Shorts
so hlače s kratkimi hlačnicami.

Kadar je človek
short of something
ali kadar je nekaj
short
, tiste stvari tisti človek nima dovolj.

seg.quote: We're dreadfully short of staff at present.
When money is short, we stick to a very careful budget.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
short of a place or amount
, ni prišlo popolnoma do določenega kraja ali doseglo določene vrednosti.

seg.quote: He drove up the hill and stopped the car just short of the summit.
He was only a year short of fifty.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is cut short
, se neha dogajati, preden je dokončano.

seg.quote: The war cut short his education.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
stops short
ali kadar nekaj
stops someone short
, tisti človek nenadoma neha delati določeno stvar, ker ga nekaj preseneti.

seg.quote: The soldier took a few steps and then stopped short.

sense.def:
To stop short of doing something
pomeni skoraj narediti nekaj.

seg.quote: He just stopped short of calling her a murderer.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is called something for short
, ima še krajšo obliko svojega imena. Za to obliko lahko rečemo, da je
short for one's name.

seg.quote: Her name was Madeleine but Celia always called her ‘Maddy’ for short.
People usually call me ‘Ferdy’. It's short for ‘Ferdinand’.

sense.def:
Izraz
in short
uporabimo, kadar na kratko povzamemo tisto, kar smo pravkar povedali.

seg.quote: I was packing, arranging the trip, cleaning the house, and saying countless goodbyes. In short, it was a hectic week.
